metadata.title: CVE-2023-52653 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:SUNRPC: fix a memleak in gss_import_v2_contextThe ctx->mech_used.data allocated by kmemdup is not freed in neithergss_import_v2_context nor it only caller gss_krb5_import_sec_context,which frees ctx on error.Thus, this patch reform the last call of gss_import_v2_context to thegss_krb5_import_ctx_v2, preventing the memleak while keepping the returnformation.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
